title: make it
body:
_****I really want there to be a series of movies about LoL, 
Not made like a big bucks movie but like the little episodes they do already but with voices and telling the story of how they battled and who are enemies and who are the allies. ****

replies.body:
Well something like that wont be coming for a while, sadly. Riot hasn't announced anything on it to my knowledge.

There is a fan version of what you just said, but it's comedy oriented and very confusing XD
Check it out [here](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=EL1F1IbpW5ajk). It's very nontraditional compared to western media though.
